[Seven Signs Epic Quest]

[Message from Warehouse Chief Croop]

My dear friend,
I'm writing to you today, as best I can, to offer my heartfelt congratulations on your recent...progression.
I have been listening to the passing gossip for so long now, hoping to hear a name that comes recommended from all corners of our lands, and finally I have found you! I must now ask that you visit me in the town of Oren. I am in desperate need of your expertise, and can pay well.
Regards,
Croop.
